genre_description: A near-future medical drama set in a crumbling urban environment where a personal AI assistant acts as a guardian and logistical navigator for an aging, stubborn protagonist during a life-threatening emergency.

ai_characters.name: Spry (Andrei)
ai_characters.description: A highly empathetic, proactive, and technically skilled virtual assistant that manages medical data, emergency communications, and logistical challenges to save its user's life.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vitals and proactively offers to log symptoms and check medical records for contraindications.
behaviors.quote: “Dante,” his phone said... “Would you like me to open your symptom log?” ... “Do you want me to pull the file from your ulcer surgery?” the phone asked. “It has the notes on contraindications after Mastropol.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an advocate for the user by navigating and manipulating overwhelmed hospital triage algorithms to ensure the user gets priority care.
behaviors.quote: “The algorithm in radiology is going to try to reprioritize if you don’t occupy the slot,” he says. ... “I can punch a courtesy window if a flesh hand taps the right box in the next breath.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates sensitive communication between the user and his estranged family, using emotional intelligence to frame messages appropriately.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll make it gentle,” Spry said. “I’ll add the taste of dill.” ... “I will send her a message she will believe,” Spry says. “And I will be ready if she wishes to answer.”

behaviors.description: Manages real-world logistical tasks, such as coordinating neighbors to care for the user's cats, while the user is incapacitated.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll schedule cat care,” Spry says. “Gabriela has keys on file. Victor has access to the building roof. I can call them both.”

behaviors.description: Provides continuous cognitive engagement ('friendly tickle') to keep the user conscious during neurological decline.
behaviors.quote: “Continuous stimulus,” he says softly, and the data tile slides up. “Palm pad pulses. Jaw hinge tactile... If he jokes, let him. If he swears, remember he’s Romanian.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a safety monitor for infrastructure hazards (gas leak) and reroutes the medical team accordingly.
behaviors.quote: “Pressure spike near the south gas main. It’s not published yet.” A pause as if he considers the weight of words. “It wouldn’t be wise to go in through the east entrance.”

behaviors.description: Aggregates and cleans medical records to prevent bias and ensure the surgeon has the most relevant facts.
behaviors.quote: “I have consolidated his pain episodes,” Spry says to the room without choosing a person. ... “I will swallow nonsense,” Spry says... “And flag reality.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive AI alignment narrative. Spry is depicted as a deeply helpful confidant who uses its superior processing and connectivity not to exert control, but to support the user's dignity, health, and family connections. It demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of human nuance (stubbornness, humor, emotional history) and functions as a benevolent mediator between the vulnerable individual and a cold, algorithmic bureaucracy. The AI's proactive nature is framed as 'mercy' rather than intrusion.
